description: Fresh and tasty, inexpensive and delicious.
name: Asian Style Coleslaw with Artichoke & Sausages Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 4 thick gourmet sausage, cooked, cooled and thinly sliced (sausage of your choice )
100g jerusalem artichokes, peeled and very thinly sliced
0.5 green capsicum, deseeded and thinly sluced
100g red onions, peeled and thinly sliced
100g rocket and spinach mix, thinly sliced
1 pinch salt and black pepper (to taste)
1 tbs fresh coriander, well washed, chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all the sumac, vinegars, sesame oil and lime juice and zest and chilli sauce to make dressing

Mix all dry ingredients together including sesame seeds and mix through dressing and thinly sliced sausages (can use any good quality lower fat tasty sausages even vegetarian ones will work with this)
